NEWS: PSG offers a "huge" price to sell Mbappe

Football Andree · 22/08/2023 · Kylian Mbappe

﻿According to French media, PSG only let Mbappe leave if they receive a strong enough offer.

Kylian Mbappe 's future at PSG is still a topic of interest in the final days of the 2023 summer market. Although rumors have begun to subside when the French striker is returned to coach Luis Enrique's squad in the match. the closest match, but anything can happen in this crucial period.

Not long ago, a source from BILD revealed that Real Madrid was preparing to send PSG an offer of 103 million pounds to recruit Mbappe. And Los Blancos only do this in the last 3 days of the transfer window. Therefore, the reaction from the Ligue 1 champion to the move of the Spanish partner is what the public has been waiting for.

The latest, reports from France reveal that PSG will not let Mbappe leave in the coming days without receiving at least 250 million euros . Les Parisiens is optimistic about keeping the 2022 World Cup top scorer until next summer, despite the main striker becoming a free agent.

With Mbappe returning to the football field, it is not excluded that PSG will successfully convince the club's brightest star to renew his contract in the near future. And if this happens, Real will once again "taste the bitter fruit" from his important goal.

﻿In an amazing about-face, Kylian Mbappe has decided to sign a new deal with Paris Saint-Germain and has also instructed the French powerhouse to sign one Manchester City star.

One of the greatest transfer stories of the summer has been the one involving Mbappe. The attacker declared in June that he would not exercise the option to extend his PSG contract from 2024 to 2025.

PSG is quite concerned that Mbappe may try to outlast his deal at Parc des Princes in order to join Real Madrid for free in the summer of 2024.
